Structs/ActionButtonComponents.html#/s:4.name: targetSelector
Structs/ActionButtonComponents.html#/s:4.abstract: Function to call when the button is tapped

Structs/ActionButtonComponents.html#/s:4.name: tag
Structs/ActionButtonComponents.html#/s:4.abstract: Tag to use to identify the button if we need to interact with it later. Pass 0 if no

Structs/DirectionInfo.html.name: DirectionInfo
Structs/DirectionInfo.html.abstract: Struct for storing relative position of keypoint to user

Structs/CurrentCoordinateInfo.html.name: CurrentCoordinateInfo
Structs/CurrentCoordinateInfo.html.abstract: Struct to store location and transform information

Structs/KeypointInfo.html.name: KeypointInfo
Structs/KeypointInfo.html.abstract: Struct to store position and orientation of a keypoint

Structs/ActionButtonComponents.html.name: ActionButtonComponents
Structs/ActionButtonComponents.html.abstract: Holds information about the buttons that are used to control navigation and tracking.

Functions.html#/s:4Clew3modyS2i_SitF.name: mod(_:_:)
Functions.html#/s:4Clew3modyS2i_SitF.abstract: Modulus function (swift’s % operator is a remainder function that doesn’t work properly for negative numbers

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC4Cle.name: fadeTransition(_:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC4Cle.abstract: Custom fade used for direction text UILabel.

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC4Cle.name: setupButtonContainer(withButtons:withMainText:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC4Cle.abstract: Configures a button container view and adds a button.

Enums/AppState.html#/s:4Clew8AppStateO10.name: mainScreen(announceArrival:)
Enums/AppState.html#/s:4Clew8AppStateO10.abstract: This is the screen the comes up immediately after the splash screen

Enums/AppState.html#/s:4Clew8AppStateO22.name: readyToNavigateOrPause(allowPause:)
Enums/AppState.html#/s:4Clew8AppStateO22.abstract: User can either navigate back or pause

Enums/AppState.html#/s:4Clew8AppStateO22.name: startingPauseProcedure
Enums/AppState.html#/s:4Clew8AppStateO22.abstract: The user has requested a pause, but has not yet put the phone in the save location

Enums/AppState.html#/s:4Clew8AppStateO18.name: pauseWaitingPeriod
Enums/AppState.html#/s:4Clew8AppStateO18.abstract: The user has hit the volume button. The app now enters a waiting period for the tracking to stabilize

Enums/AppState.html#/s:4Clew8AppStateO24.name: completingPauseProcedure
Enums/AppState.html#/s:4Clew8AppStateO24.abstract: user is attempting to complete the pausing procedure

Enums/AppState.html#/s:4Clew8AppStateO23.name: startingResumeProcedure(route:mapAsAny:navigateStartToEnd:)
Enums/AppState.html#/s:4Clew8AppStateO23.abstract: user has hit the resume button and is waiting for the volume to hit

Enums/AppState.html#/s:4Clew8AppStateO28.name: readyForFinalResumeAlignment
Enums/AppState.html#/s:4Clew8AppStateO28.abstract: the AR session has entered the relocalizing state, which means that we can now realign the session

Enums/AppState.html#/s:4Clew8AppStateO8r.name: rawValue
Enums/AppState.html#/s:4Clew8AppStateO8r.abstract: rawValue is useful for serializing state values, which we are currently using for our logging feature

Global Variables.html#/s:4Clew16HapticDi.name: HapticDirections
Global Variables.html#/s:4Clew16HapticDi.abstract: Dictionary of directions, somehow based on haptic feedback.

Global Variables.html#/s:4Clew12TurnWarn.name: TurnWarnings
Global Variables.html#/s:4Clew12TurnWarn.abstract: Dictionary of turn warnings based on clock position.

Classes/RecordButtonKit/ResizingBehavior.name: aspectFill
Classes/RecordButtonKit/ResizingBehavior.abstract: The content is proportionally resized to fit into the target rectangle.

Classes/RecordButtonKit/ResizingBehavior.name: stretch
Classes/RecordButtonKit/ResizingBehavior.abstract: The content is proportionally resized to completely fill the target rectangle.

Classes/RecordButtonKit/ResizingBehavior.name: center
Classes/RecordButtonKit/ResizingBehavior.abstract: The content is stretched to match the entire target rectangle.

Classes/RecordButtonKit/ResizingBehavior.name: apply(rect:target:)
Classes/RecordButtonKit/ResizingBehavior.abstract: The content is centered in the target rectangle, but it is NOT resized.

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: alignmentWaitingPeriod
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: How long to wait (in seconds) between the alignment request and grabbing the transform

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: trackingSessionState
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: The state of the ARKit tracking session as last communicated to us through the delgate protocol. This is useful if you want to do something different in the delegate method depending on the previous state

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: state
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: The state of the app. This should be constantly referenced and updated as the app transitions

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: synth
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: When VoiceOver is not active, we use AVSpeechSynthesizer for speech feedback

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: currentAnnouncement
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: The announcement that is currently being read. If this is nil, that implies nothing is being read

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: nextAnnouncement
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: The announcement that should be read immediately after this one finishes

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: suppressTrackingWarnings
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: A boolean that tracks whether or not to suppress tracking warnings. By default we don’t suppress, but when the help popover is presented we do.

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: creatingRouteLandmark
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: This Boolean marks whether or not the pause procedure is being used to create a landmark at the start of a route (true) or if it is being used to pause an already recorded route

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: isResumedRoute
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: This Boolean marks whether or not the user is resuming a route

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: attemptingRelocalization
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: Set to true when the user is attempting to load a saved route that has a map associated with it. Once relocalization succeeds, this flag should be set back to false

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: voiceNoteToPlay
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: This is an audio player that queues up the voice note associated with a particular route landmark. The player is created whenever a saved route is loaded. Loading it before the user clicks the Play Voice Note button allows us to call the prepareToPlay function which reduces the latency when the user clicks the Play Voice Note button.

Classes/ViewController.html#/c:@M@Clew@o.name: speechSynthesizer(_:didFinish:)
Classes/ViewController.html#/c:@M@Clew@o.abstract: Called when an utterance is finished. We implement this function so that we can keep track of

Classes/ViewController.html#/c:@M@Clew@o.name: speechSynthesizer(_:didCancel:)
Classes/ViewController.html#/c:@M@Clew@o.abstract: Called when an utterance is canceled. We implement this function so that we can keep track of

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: angleOffsetTimer
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: While recording, every 0.01s, check to see if we should reset the heading offset

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: angleDeviationThreshold
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: A threshold to determine when the phone rotated too much to update the angle offset

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: requiredDistance
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: The minimum distance traveled in the floor plane in order to update the angle offset

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: linearDeviationThreshold
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: A threshold to determine when a path is too curvy to update the angle offset

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: locationRingBuffer
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: a ring buffer used to keep the last 50 positions of the phone

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: headingRingBuffer
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: a ring buffer used to keep the last 100 headings of the phone

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: recordPathButton
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: Image, label, and target for start recording button.

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: addLandmarkButton
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: Image, label, and target for start recording button.

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: stopRecordingButton
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: Image, label, and target for stop recording button.

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: startNavigationButton
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: Image, label, and target for start navigation button.

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: pauseButton
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: Title, label, and target for the pause button

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: stopNavigationButton
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: Image, label, and target for stop navigation button.

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: routesButton
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: Image, label, and target for routes button.

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: adjustOffset
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: True if the offset between direction of travel and phone should be updated over time

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: strictHaptic
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: True if we should use a cone of pi/12 and false if we should use a cone of pi/6 when deciding whether to issue haptic feedback

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: shouldDropMappingAnchors
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: True if we should add anchors ahead of the user to encourage more ARWorldMap detail. In limited testing this did not show promise, therefore it is disabled

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: stopRecordingView
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: Button view container for stop recording button

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: recordPathView
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: Button view container for start recording button.

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: startNavigationView
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: Button view container for start navigation button

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: stopNavigationView
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: Button view container for stop navigation button

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: buttonFrameWidth
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: Button frame extends the entire width of screen

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: showNavigatePathWithoutLandmarkWarning()
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: Display a warning that tells the user they must create a landmark

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: drawUI()
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: Initializes, configures, and adds all subviews defined programmatically.

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: logger
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: Interface for logging data about the session and the path

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: pausedTransform
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: This keeps track of the paused transform while the current session is being realigned to the saved route

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: restartSessionIfFailedToRelocalize()
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: This helper function will restart the tracking session if a relocalization was in progress but did not succeed. This is useful in the case when you want to allow for the recording of a new route and don’t want to have the possibility achieving relocalization halfway through recording the route.

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: getHeadingOffset()
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: Calculate the offset between the phone’s heading (either its z-axis or y-axis projected into the floor plane) and the user’s direction of travel. This offset allows us to give directions based on the user’s movement rather than the direction of the phone.

Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.name: announce(announcement:)
Classes/ViewController.html#/s:4Clew14Vi.abstract: Communicates a message to the user via speech. If VoiceOver is active, then VoiceOver is used

Classes/ViewController.html#/c:@CM@Clew@.name: adaptivePresentationStyle(for:)
Classes/ViewController.html#/c:@CM@Clew@.abstract: Makes sure that popovers are not modal

Classes/ViewController.html#/c:@CM@Clew@.name: prepare(for:sender:)
Classes/ViewController.html#/c:@CM@Clew@.abstract: Ensures that all popover segues are popovers (note: I don’t quite understand when this would not be the case)

Classes/RingBuffer.html#/s:4Clew10RingBu.name: init(capacity:)
Classes/RingBuffer.html#/s:4Clew10RingBu.abstract: Create the ring buffer with the specified capacity. Initially, all values will be nil

Classes/RingBuffer.html#/s:4Clew10RingBu.name: insert(_:)
Classes/RingBuffer.html#/s:4Clew10RingBu.abstract: Insert a new element into the buffer

Classes/RingBuffer.html#/s:4Clew10RingBu.name: get(_:)
Classes/RingBuffer.html#/s:4Clew10RingBu.abstract: Get the index in the buffer stored at the specified index.

Classes/PathLogger.html#/s:4Clew10PathLo.name: pathData
Classes/PathLogger.html#/s:4Clew10PathLo.abstract: path data taken during RECORDPATH - [[1x16 transform matrix]]

Classes/PathLogger.html#/s:4Clew10PathLo.name: navigationData
Classes/PathLogger.html#/s:4Clew10PathLo.abstract: path data taken during NAVIGATEPATH - [[1x16 transform matrix]]

Classes/PathLogger.html#/s:4Clew10PathLo.name: stateSequence
Classes/PathLogger.html#/s:4Clew10PathLo.abstract: all state transitions the app went through

Classes/PathFinder.html#/s:4Clew10PathFi.name: init(crumbs:hapticFeedback:voiceFeedback:)
Classes/PathFinder.html#/s:4Clew10PathFi.abstract: Initializes the PathFinder class and determines the value of pathWidth

Classes/PathFinder.html#/s:4Clew10PathFi.name: keypoints
Classes/PathFinder.html#/s:4Clew10PathFi.abstract: a list of KeypointInfo objects representing the important turns in the path.

Classes/PathFinder.html#/s:4Clew10PathFi.name: getKeypoints(edibleCrumbs:)
Classes/PathFinder.html#/s:4Clew10PathFi.abstract: Creates a list of keypoints in a path given a list of points dropped several times per second.

Classes/PathFinder.html#/s:4Clew10PathFi.name: calculateKeypoints(edibleCrumbs:)
Classes/PathFinder.html#/s:4Clew10PathFi.abstract: Recursively simplifies a path of points using Ramer-Douglas-Peucker algorithm.

Classes/Navigation.html#/s:4Clew10Naviga.name: headingOffset
Classes/Navigation.html#/s:4Clew10Naviga.abstract: The offset between the user’s direction of travel (assumed to be aligned with the front of their body and the phone’s orientation)

Classes/Navigation.html#/s:4Clew10Naviga.name: getPhoneHeadingYaw(currentLocation:)
Classes/Navigation.html#/s:4Clew10Naviga.abstract: Get the heading for the phone suitable for computing directions to the next waypoint.

Classes/Navigation.html#/s:4Clew10Naviga.name: getDirections(currentLocation:nextKeypoint:)
Classes/Navigation.html#/s:4Clew10Naviga.abstract: Determines position of the next keypoint relative to the iPhone’s current position.

Classes/Navigation.html#/s:4Clew10Naviga.name: getAngleDiff(angle1:angle2:)
Classes/Navigation.html#/s:4Clew10Naviga.abstract: Determines the difference between two angles, in radians

Classes/Navigation.html#/s:4Clew10Naviga.name: averageAngle(a:b:)
Classes/Navigation.html#/s:4Clew10Naviga.abstract: Computes the average between two angles (accounting for wraparound)

Classes/DataPersistence.html#/s:4Clew15D.name: routes
Classes/DataPersistence.html#/s:4Clew15D.abstract: The list of routes. This should not be modified directly to avoid divergence of this object from the data that is stored persistently.

Classes/DataPersistence.html#/s:4Clew15D.name: init()
Classes/DataPersistence.html#/s:4Clew15D.abstract: Create the object by loading the saved routes from the URL returned by getRoutesURL()

Classes/DataPersistence.html#/s:4Clew15D.name: archive(route:worldMapAsAny:)
Classes/DataPersistence.html#/s:4Clew15D.abstract: Save the specified route with the optional ARWorldMap. The variable class attribute routes will automatically be updated by this function.

Classes/DataPersistence.html#/s:4Clew15D.name: unarchiveMap(id:)
Classes/DataPersistence.html#/s:4Clew15D.abstract: Load the map from the app’s local storage. If we are on a platform that doesn’t support ARWorldMap, this function always returns nil

Classes/AppDelegate.html#/c:@M@Clew@objc.name: window
Classes/AppDelegate.html#/c:@M@Clew@objc.abstract: A handle to the app’s main window

Classes/AppDelegate.html#/c:@M@Clew@objc.name: application(_:didFinishLaunchingWithOptions:)
Classes/AppDelegate.html#/c:@M@Clew@objc.abstract: Called when the app finishes launching. Currently, this is where we setup Firebase and make sure the phone screen doesn’t lock while we are using the app.

Classes/AppDelegate.html#/c:@M@Clew@objc.name: applicationWillResignActive(_:)
Classes/AppDelegate.html#/c:@M@Clew@objc.abstract: Sent when the application is about to move from active to inactive state. In Clew’s current implementation, this method doesn’t do anything.

Classes/AppDelegate.html#/c:@M@Clew@objc.name: applicationDidEnterBackground(_:)
Classes/AppDelegate.html#/c:@M@Clew@objc.abstract: This method is called when the app is entering the background. This is where timerss should be invalidated and shared resources should be relinquished. In Clew’s current implementation, this method doesn’t do anything.

Classes/AppDelegate.html#/c:@M@Clew@objc.name: applicationDidBecomeActive(_:)
Classes/AppDelegate.html#/c:@M@Clew@objc.abstract: Called when the application becomes active. In Clew’s current implementation, this method doesn’t do anything.

Classes/AppDelegate.html#/c:@M@Clew@objc.name: applicationWillTerminate(_:)
Classes/AppDelegate.html#/c:@M@Clew@objc.abstract: Called when the application becomes is about to terminate. In Clew’s current implementation, this method doesn’t do anything.

Classes/AppDelegate.html.name: AppDelegate
Classes/AppDelegate.html.abstract: This class handles various state changes for the app.

Classes/DataPersistence.html.name: DataPersistence
Classes/DataPersistence.html.abstract: This class handles saving and loading routes.

Classes/Navigation.html.name: Navigation
Classes/Navigation.html.abstract: Navigation class that provides direction information given 2 LocationInfo position

Classes/LocationInfo.html.name: LocationInfo
Classes/LocationInfo.html.abstract: Struct to store position information and yaw

Classes/PathFinder.html.name: PathFinder
Classes/PathFinder.html.abstract: Pathfinder class calculates turns or keypoints given a path array of LocationInfo

Classes/RingBuffer.html.name: RingBuffer
Classes/RingBuffer.html.abstract: A generic RingBuffer that supports some basic operations

Global Variables.html.name: Global Variables
Global Variables.html.abstract: The following global variables are available globally.
